openstack_networking_subnet_route_v2.description: Creates a routing entry on a OpenStack V2 subnet.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 networking client.

subnet_id.description: ID of the subnet this routing entry belongs to. Changing

destination_cidr.description: CIDR block to match on the packet’s destination IP. Changing

next_hop.description: IP address of the next hop gateway.  Changing
